title: The Power of JavaScript
author: John Doe
content: JavaScript is a versatile language used for both client-side and server-side programming. In this post, we explore its features and capabilities.

title: 10 Tips for Learning React
author: Jane Smith
content: React is one of the most popular libraries for building user interfaces. Here are 10 tips to help you get started.

title: Understanding Node.js
author: Sunny Kumar
content: Node.js allows developers to use JavaScript on the server side. Learn about its key features and how it works.

title: CSS Grid vs Flexbox
author: Emily Davis
content: Both CSS Grid and Flexbox are powerful layout tools. This post discusses their differences and when to use each.

title: Why Learn Programming?
author: Michael Brown
content: Programming is a valuable skill in today's tech-driven world. Discover the benefits of learning to code.
